body.name: ZIOVO 2023 Tablet 10.1 inch Android 13 Tablet, 14GB + 128GB, 512GB Expand, Octa-Core, 2 in 1 Tablets with Keyboard, 1280x800, 8000mAh, Bluetooth, 8MP+5MP, GMS, 2.4G/5G WiFi Split Screen Support-Blue
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【Excellent Android 13 System and Octa-Core Processor】The 10-inch tablet is loaded with the latest Android 13 system, featuring a high-speed 2.0Ghz octa-core processor for faster and smoother overall operation, as well as enhanced protection of personal privacy. The tablet is Google certified and can download popular apps such as YouTube, Instagram, Skype, Netfix, games, etc. directly from the play store that is already pre-installed to fulfill your daily needs.

【14GB RAM/128GB ROM + 512GB Expand】The tablet has 14GB (8 actual + 6 virtual) of RAM and 128GB ROM, and supports the insertion of up to 512GB micro SD card, you can easily launch apps, watch videos, use learning tools, read eBooks, play games, etc., and rest assured that you can store as many apps, photos, videos, etc. as you want without worrying about running out of space.

【10.1-inch Super Large IPS Screen & Split Screen Operation】 This Android 13 Tablet comes with a 10.1-inch IPS 1280x800 HD touch screen with vibrant colors, allowing you to enjoy a comfortable video viewing experience. Support split-screen operation, you can take notes while having a meeting, or watch a movie while chatting, etc., which makes life and work more efficient. The 5MP front and 8MP rear cameras bring you great photos and clear video chats.

【8000mAh Big Battery Ultra Long Life + Dual Band WiFi】The Android tablet comes with a huge 8000mAh battery for long-lasting performance. It can last up to 16.5 hours on a single charge, perfect for long commute, traveling, reading, watching movies, TV shows and listening to music, can be easily charged via Type-C. Support 2.4G and 5G WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, bring you faster internet and data transfer speed.

【2-in-1 Tablet with Keyboard】Android 13 Tablet with Bluetooth keyboard and wireless mouse, etc. You can switch laptop mode at any time, giving you convenience for work, life and entertainment. It is the best gift for families, students, business people, writers. We provide professional tablet attentive service, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: 2023 Tablet 10.1 inch Android 13 Tablet, 14GB + 128GB, 512GB Expand, Octa-Core, 2 in 1 Tablets with Keyboard, 1280x800, 8000mAh, Bluetooth, 8MP+5MP, GMS, 2.4G/5G WiFi Split Screen Support Specification: OS: Android 13 Screen Size: 10.1 inch CPU: Octa-Core, 2.0GHZ RAM: 14GB(8 Physical+6 Virtual) RAM ROM: 128GB Storage External Storage：Support up to 512 GB Micro SD Card Connection: 5G+2.4GHZ WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0 Resolution: 1200*800 support 1080p video playback Hardware Configuration: Interfaces: Type C port, Micro SD Card slot, Earphone port, Mic supported Camera: 8MP Rear and 5MP Front Battery: 8000mAh Package includes: 1. 10 inch Tablet with Case 2. 1* Screen Protector 3. Charging Adapter with Type C Cable 4. 1*Bluetooth Keyboard & 1*Wireless Mouse 5. User Manual 6. Well-designed Box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet. Fantastic value!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tablet to replace my old kindle which was just not working well anymore--mostly for reading and watching when I am on the treadmill, but also for doing art projects and other on-the-go tasks. This tablet is a wonderful bargain. To begin with, It is packaged beautifully and has lots of extras like a really nice case, a bluetooth keyboard and mouse (which is a really nice thing to have when I am doing spreadsheets, etc.) and a charger (which lots of tablets don't come with anymore) It also comes with an extra screen protector. The pure Android meshes perfectly with my pixel phone and other google accounts. Setup is fast, smooth and very easy. Display is lovely and responsive and the battery life so far is really great. For the money, you absolutely cannot beat this deal! (Customer service is also great!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a very high-quality good value tablet
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like that this tablet is multifunctional and easy to set up multitasking with watching videos, uploading videos, downloading games, playing games, watching movies shows work send an emails. It also has a very vivid, clear picture bright picture the volume is good where you don’t need to turn the volume all the way up and this tablet doesn’t freeze up, it doesn’t be fuzzy and it does everything that is supposed to do with good speed is very sturdy and is very constructive and I like the keyboard and the mouse in the case everything is easy to set up and you can’t go wrong with this tablet is a very excellent Good value quality for the price so buy you like it when you try it and keep it you can’t go wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This tablet deserves more than 5 stars
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Right out o the box this tablet was at nearly full battery charge. The clock was set to the correct time even the correct time zone. It took only ten minutes to set up and connect to all my devices.The tablet comes with 8 GB RAM plus 6 GB of Virtual RAM. In settings, you can see that all 14 GB is available. It has an octa-core CPU and 128 GB of ROM. Most tablets in this price range have 3 or 4 GB of RAM and only 64 or 32 GB of ROM.The tablet connected immediately to the internet and browses very quickly. See the video of how quickly it downloaded from the Play Store the WORD App, installed, and launched it. A simple description is it works as efficiently as a laptop.You can add a micro-SD card of up to 512 GB. Connecting external flash drives through the USB-C jack is the easiest I have ever had with any tablet. Just go to settings, select storage and the tablet recognizes the external drive. All you need to do is select the external drive. Then, from the files app, you can see all available drives.The wireless keyboard has an excellent touch and connects effortlessly through Bluetooth. The wireless mouse works as well as any and connects with the USB-C adapter. The display is high quality and videos play without any glitches. The sound from the two speakers is excellent. MP3s also have excellent quality.You cannot do better than this tablet at this price. You can spend much more and you still won’t get a better tablet. I give it five stars because that’s as high as they allow. It does everything you would want from a tablet and more. Check the videos I have posted to see how quickly and effortlessly it works right out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, easy to use, my mom loves it!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is the second Ziovo product that I have purchased. I keep coming back to these guys because the products are affordable and a good quality. This tablet is easy to use and set up. It runs android OS and is very user friendly. Great price for the products you get. I love that this comes with a sturdy case, a mouse and a key board. Perfect for when I am on the go! This makes the perfect gift for family members. My mom is not tech-savvy and she is able to use this easily. The quality of the items are what keep me buying from this company.Highly recommend if you need to get someone a gift. There is even parental controls if your kids use this like mine do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oh Yes Love it
reviews.reviewText: I really love this Tablet great product for the money keyboard works fabulous carrying case is nice.. 5 stars all around..Has plenty of storage is fast efficient and works extremely well speakers are nice and loud.. I use it every morning when I'm having coffee on my Ocean view patio..Highly recommend you buy one cannot not beat it for the price..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got my tablet safely and on time. It works great thus far. It is easy to use,fast, and I did get more bang for my buck. Wish the better life was longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet/mini laptop!
reviews.reviewText: I Love this tablet. It comes with everything...keyboard, cordless mouse, screen protector and case and even its own block! My middle schooler uses it for school school since it's like a mini laptop and my son uses it to play roblox. It's great for everything, especially road trips. Great photo quality also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for what it is. Worth the price.
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this product so far. As long as you realize you won't be getting any updates to the Android OS and it will eventually become unable to run some apps then it is well worth the price I paid, a little over 100$. I am a 'techie' and usually prefer devices that I can install custom ROMs on, but I couldn't pass up this hardware for this price and I haven't been disappointed. This is perfect for a casual user, which lets face it most tablet users are. I would and have recommended this to friends to and family. I'm not a huge fan of this kind of tech that frankly will end up in a landfill sooner because of the lack of OS updates, but the prices big names like Samsung charge for basically the same hardware are frankly ridiculous.
